h1.span: Parent Resources for Extended School Closure

span.p: Here are some online resources to keep your children engaged during our extended closure:

Also, Charter is providing free Internet services for those who need it during the extended school closure. Click the following link for more information: https://corporate.charter.com/newsroom/charter-to-offer-free-access-to-spectrum-broadband-and-wifi-for-60-days-for-new-K12-and-college-student-households-and-more
To receive services, parents may need to prove that your child attends a Title I/CEP school district. Please use the attached letter from Dr. Mize as such proof.
